message: Let's make a deal, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
Let's split fairly, considering the inflation ahead.
Bob, this is the best deal you'll get. Take it before inflation eats away at it even more.
Inflation is rising, this might be the last good offer.
Bob, let's be realistic. This is the last round where we both gain something substantial. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical choice at this point.
